com.phunware.location.provider
Interface PwLocationProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
PwAbstractLocationProvider, PwFusedLocationProvider, PwMseLocationProvider, PwQualcommLocationProvider, PwSlLocationProvider
public interface PwLocationProvider

Defines the methods used to create a location provider.

 java.lang.String getSettingIntentAction()

          Stops the generation of location updates.
 void requestLocationUpdates(PwLocationListener pwLocationListener)

Method Detail

isAvailable

boolean isAvailable()
Returns a boolean value indicating whether location services are enabled on the device.

Returns:
true when location provider is available, false otherwise.

getSettingIntentAction

java.lang.String getSettingIntentAction()
Returns a string value of intent action, when isAvailable() is false, can use this to open appropriate setting dialog.

Returns:
intent action string

requestLocationUpdates

Starts the generation of updates that report the user's current location.
